narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ark Regional Services, INC is a Occupational Therapist provider based in Laramie, WY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $41.6M in Medicaid payments across 169K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $41.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
